# Descriptive Stats

There are functions to find descriptive stats in base R such as follows using the mpg data set

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
attach(mpg)

max(cyl)
min(cyl)
mean(cyl)
range(cyl)
sum(cyl)
prod(cyl)
median(cyl)
sd(cyl)
head(cyl)
summary(cyl)
```

Using the psych package provides summary statistics. 

```{r}
install.packages("psych")
library(psych)
describe(cyl)
```
